faq.content:
Think about a cloud. Just float around and be there. Decide where your cloud lives. Maybe he lives right in here. Let's put some highlights on these little trees. The sun wouldn't forget them. Let the paint work. This present moment is perfect simply due to the fact you're experiencing it. These things happen automatically. All you have to do is just let them happen. Here we're limited by the time we have. We'll take a little bit of Van Dyke Brown. You want your tree to have some character.

Make it special. I was blessed with a very steady hand; and it comes in very handy when you're doing these little delicate things.
